meanings.definition: The act of moving or progressing from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: The passaging of the train through the tunnel was smooth and swift.
meanings.sent2: The passaging of goods from the warehouse to the store was efficient.
meanings.sent3: The passaging of the squirrel across the tree branches was quite entertaining to watch.
meanings.sent4: The passaging of time through the seasons reminds us of life's constant change.
meanings.sent5: The passaging of the river through the valley carved a beautiful landscape.

meanings.definition: The act of transmitting or conveying something.
meanings.sent1: The passaging of information through the internet is crucial for communication.
meanings.sent2: The passaging of emotions through music can be powerful and moving.
meanings.sent3: The passaging of jokes during the party had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: The passaging of light through the prism created a spectrum of colors.
meanings.sent5: The passaging of knowledge from teacher to student is a fundamental part of education.

meanings.definition: The act of navigating through a difficult situation or obstacle.
meanings.sent1: The passaging of the hiker through the dense forest required skill and determination.
meanings.sent2: The passaging of the ship through the stormy seas was perilous.
meanings.sent3: The passaging of the detective through the clues finally led to solving the case.
meanings.sent4: The passaging of the athlete through injuries and setbacks made the victory even sweeter.
meanings.sent5: The passaging of the hero through trials and tribulations inspired many.
